description.author: Andrea Rossato and Jose A. Ortega Ruiz
description.synopsis: A Minimalistic Text Based Status Bar
description.description:
Xmobar is a minimalistic text based status bar.

Inspired by the Ion3 status bar, it supports similar
features, like dynamic color management, output templates,
and extensibility through plugins.

package-flags.name: with_xft
package-flags.description: Use Xft to render text. UTF-8 support included.

package-flags.name: with_inotify
package-flags.description: inotify support (modern Linux only). Required for the Mail and MBox plugins.

package-flags.name: with_iwlib
package-flags.description: Wireless info support. Required for the Wireless plugin, needs iwlib installed.

package-flags.name: with_alsa
package-flags.description: Use alsa-mixer to get the volume from soundcards.

package-flags.name: with_dbus
package-flags.description: Publish a service on the session bus for controlling xmobar.

package-flags.name: with_xpm
package-flags.description: Enable usage of xpm for icons.
